xxl.core.io.raw
Class RAFRawAccess

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.raw.RAFRawAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
RawAccess
public class RAFRawAccess
extends Object
implements RawAccess

Implements RawAcces with java.io.RandomAccessFile (->RAF).

Constructor Summary
RAFRawAccess(String filename)
          Returns a new instance of a raw access that uses a RandomAccessFile.
RAFRawAccess(String filename, boolean useSync)
          Returns a new instance of a raw access that uses a RandomAccessFile (with sector size 512 bytes).
RAFRawAccess(String filename, boolean useSync, int sectorSize)
          Returns a new instance of a raw access that uses a RandomAccessFile.

          Closes device or file See super class for detailed description

          Opens a device or file See super class for detailed description

          Reads block from file/device See super class for detailed description
 String toString()
          Outputs a String representation of the raw device.

          Writes block to file/device See super class for detailed description

Constructor Detail

RAFRawAccess

public RAFRawAccess(String filename,
                    boolean useSync,
                    int sectorSize)
             throws RawAccessException
Returns a new instance of a raw access that uses a RandomAccessFile.

Parameters:
filename - name of device or file
useSync - make a synchronization call after each read/write
sectorSize - size of a sector
Throws:
RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException
